info.name: Customizeable / dark theme
info.description: A theme for ExlusivelyGaming, that also allow you to set your own color theme. Default is dark with sites main colours.
info.additionalInfo:
Check bottom of the forum page for a version indicator, letting you know if you have the latest update of this theme. It is WIP, not all pages/places have been styled yet. Changelog: 1.02
  1. Re-skinned notifications listings in message center
  2. Fixed some hovers and indiactors in message center
  3. Removed drop shadow from message list center nav
  4. Changed URL of version indiactor, forgot about caching
1.01
  1. Added ability to change your colours through Userstyle's UI.
  2. Change version icon to be hosted on my site until Imgur fixes image editing feature.
  3. Fixed more colours that have not been re-defined to adapt your own colour theme.
  4. Fixed border colors and indentation on right side of activity stream
  5. Re-skinned the new message popup
